refnamediv.refpurpose: Compares a template in overlapped image regions

listitem.para: Searched template. It must not be greater than the source image and have the same data type of input image.
Map of comparison results. It must be single channel 32-bit floating-point. Its size is (W-w+1) * (H-h+1) if image is W * H and template_image is w * h

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function compares the w * h sized images of the original image against the template image and stores the result in the new_image.
